title: The Heart's Appeal
description: Julia Bernay has come to London to become a doctorâ€”a glorious new opportunity for women during the reign of Victoria. When she witnesses a serious accident, her quick actions save the life of barrister Michael Stephenson. He rose above his family's stigma, but can he rise to the challenge of the fiercely independent woman who has swept into his life?
author: Jennifer Delamere
